text: Hi <@U0349FQ2885>. An email campaign ID is created for each workflow the email is part of. The unique identifier for the email is the contentId. You could use this API to get the email definition based on the campaign ID. <https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/email/get_campaign_data>
Thanks <@U9KA594Q3> -- how do I find the contentID, and how do I know which of the IDs on the Internal HubSpot IDs is the campaignID?
I'm looking for some guidance on trying out transactional emails using a developer account without buying the appropriate package ($600/month). Is this possible?

Hi there! If you reach out to your account manager, you may be eligible for the transactional email add-on trial. This would allow you to try out the functionality for a set amount of time. This trial does not come with a transactional IP, but does allow access to the APIs so you can test those out. Not all portals are eligible for the trial, so I'd connect with your account manager to find out.
